group_1.textRight: I see… So you’ve found
your dream for the future as a picture book author…

group_1.textLeft: Yes… Although… it’s a little embarrassing…

group_1.textRight: It’s amazing, Sana-chan.

group_1.textLeft: Not really… I just want to become one, but I still @haven’t done anything for real...

group_1.textRight: But not everyone has a dream for their future.
I also… haven’t seriously settled on what I want @to do in the future...

group_1.textLeft: I already made up my mind!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, Ui’s also amazing.

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe…!
I support Futaba-san’s dream.

group_1.textRight: Me too…!

group_1.textLeft: …![chara:100401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100401:cheek_1][chara:100401:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100401:lipSynch_1]@Thank you very much…!

group_1.textRight: Ah, right. Recently I saw a poster on the school @bulletin board
for a picture book contest that’s geared towards students.

group_1.textLeft: A contest…?

group_1.textRight: Somehow or another, I remembered it because the poster was so pretty...
If the contest catches your fancy, why not @search it up online?

group_1.textLeft: But… I haven’t even produced one picture book…
I’ll be short on time for entering the contest...

group_1.textRight: Ah, that is true…

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:100401:eyeClose_1][chara:100401:lipSynch_1]Still.
(If I can apply in time, I want to try making @something…)
I’ll try looking into it myself…!
Thank you so much, Iroha-san…!

group_1.textRight: Nuh-uh, it’s my pleasure.

group_1.textLeft: (Don’t be scared… Try to take that one step forward before anything else…)
(Ai-chan…)

group_1.textRight: Have you decided on what genre of picture book @you’d like to create?

group_1.textLeft: Um… I’d like to create picture books that encourage people who are struggling...

group_1.textRight: Sana-chan’s picture books
will undoubtedly contain heartwarming stories @that’ll comfort anyone who reads them.

group_1.textLeft: W-Would they really...
I’ll be delighted if it turns out that way...
A-And also… I’m planning on turning
the things that happened with me and Ai-chan @into a picture book too…

group_1.textRight: I see…

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo-san…?

group_1.textRight: ...Ah, one moment.
Futaba-san.

group_1.textLeft: Yes…?

group_1.textRight: If you’re using Ai as the model for a character,
it might be best if you run that by Hiiragi-san.
Ai originally is
a [textBlue:Rumor] Hiiragi-san created, one of her stories...

group_1.textLeft: Ah… You’re right… I hadn’t thought about that @at all...

group_1.textRight: I think Nemu-chan would definitely agree.
Yeah, I think so too. Let’s go ask her together @next time.
...Sana-chan?

group_1.textLeft: (Ui-chan kept me company as I practiced…)
(I asked Iroha-san about the contest…)
(Yachiyo-san gave me advice…)
(...Because this is something I want to do, @I have to take it from here on out…)
Iroha-san, I’ll be okay...
I’ll go ask her by myself…!

group_1.textCenter: Because this is *my* dream… I have to do this @alone…!
